name: GardeningTips
0:
”Alexa open gardening tips”
”Alexa ask gardening tips for a tip”
”Alexa tell gardening tips to help”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gardening tips
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ask for Gardening Tips, and learn about what really matters, like keeping your veggies alive

Gardening Tips provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you green fingered

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Gardening Tips" or "Alexa, open Gardening Tips" to get a tip".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"

All credit for tips from:
https://www.rd.com/home/gardening/gardening-tips-for-beginners/
